oracle.kv.table

Interface BooleanValue

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<FieldValue>, FieldValue

    public interface BooleanValue
extends FieldValue
    BooleanValue extends FieldValue to represent a simple boolean value.
    Since:
    3.0
